title: Early Communication in Australia
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Social life and customs
abstract: How have Australians communicated through history?
description: Challenged to create a moving image work on the theme 'Pacific Explorer', this highly commended work uses Australian stamps with historical and Aboriginal themes to narrate the methods and ways Australians have communicated over time.  An animated short entered to "Create a Stamp Story" section of ACMI's 'Screen It' media making competition for Primary Schools.
related_objects: Collection; B1006088; Screen It 2004; Active; 01 Jan 2005-30 Apr 2005
active_carriers_public_types_and_formats: MPEG-2 Digital File; Memory Grid Pod Full Encode
